description.value: The powers of intrigue veil your poisons and magic items from magical scrutiny. As a standard action, you can touch an object, granting it the benefits of the spells @Compendium[pf1.spells.l01ajd0m4xgwq3fd]{Magic Aura} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.gf9fj6c1wwmqiksv]{Obscure Poison}. You can use this ability at will, but each time you do, the effects of any previous use end.
